text:
Fredrick Chien, or Chien Foo (; born 17 February 1935) is a Chinese politician. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of China on Taiwan from 1990 to 1996 and president of the Control Yuan from 1999 to 2005.
Chien was born in Hangzhou, Chekiang.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of China
